attributes.action: Rejoined the European Union the & repeal the Brexit Legislation New Referendum
attributes.additional_details: Because the Public & Brexiteers MEP was miss lead into false & Miss leading promise if they voted to leave European Union & European Courts of Justice. British Public & British Trade has suffered to the Detriment of Brexit. The government have failed to achieve a European Union Trade deal to the positive obligation of British Public. The Economical Cost to Britons have been Huge with Lose of Businesses & investment & Economical cost was massive
attributes.background: To re-in act the European Community Act (1972) & EEC & ECJ Legislation & to undertake further Referendum on Rejoining The European Union & Re-enacting all treaties legislations with European Union European courts of Justice EEC & ECJ. Repeal Brexit Legislation to the Bin

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636499
